products.title: Choices Harlow Midnight Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Adding a bit of texture to your space is a great way to make it feel homely and inviting and this harlow midnight blue roller has texture in spades. The woven fabric softens up the harsh edges of your room for instant relaxation.
